verbose_text: Although we found that blocking PD1 reduces Foxp3 + Tregs, the combination of both TGF-beta-neutralizing and PD1 blocking antibodies synergistically reduces the Treg differentiation induced by Smad7 -/- DCs to the level induced by Smad7 fl/fl DCs (XREF_FIG).
evidence: PD1-blocking antibodies synergistically reduces the Treg differentiation induced by Smad7 -/-  DCs
